website_summaries.verdict: A customizable pad that’s especially useful if you ride multiple horses.
pros: Four memory foam inserts for the Velcro-closed pockets can create a custom, comfortable fit
Some users also used the pockets for their own gel inserts with excellent results
Works well for sensitive backs and for shock absorption, which is useful when jumping
A dressage/Western cut pad is also available
cons: Pricey, and does not work well with endurance saddles

customer_reviews.title: Pretty blue but no memory foam in this pad.
customer_reviews.text: It's an meh pad. I was expecting better foam that actually provided a little poof once the saddle and rider weight were in place, you know, like memory foam. The foam in this pad squished down to nothing. The shims made no real difference and the foam is certainly not memory foam. It would be cheaper to buy a foam mattress and slice off enough shims for 4 barns full of horses. Does have have a pretty blue color.
customer_reviews.author: The Sound Refinery

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this saddle pad
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this saddle pad! I already have two of them and they're my favorites BAR NONE! These are the only saddle pads I'll be buying from now on for my every day and show rides! Durable and PERFECT fit on both my Arabian and Thoroughbred!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product: it looks nice; I washed it several times (both hand wash and delicate cycle) and still looks like new; drys quickly after the wash or after the intense ride; nicely fits my saddlebred with high withers. The green color is a clasic hunter green, suits nicely liver chestnut horse. I bought two of these and would recommend it to anyone who is interested.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Great saddle pad!
customer_reviews.text: Our horse is young (4 yo Thoroughbred), so he’s still narrow through withers with not much muscle or fat padding. My daughter loves this saddle pad, and our horse seems to appreciate it too. Riding is more comfortable for both. This is her go to pad now. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diana W.

customer_reviews.title: Great pad, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great pad. Just enough correction and fits my forward flap 17.5 great. Doesn't move at all, and my horse has almost no barrel so that really impressed me. Also the aqua color looks really nice on chestnusts. Used this pad for every ride since I purchased 2 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: julesatthebarn

customer_reviews.title: I want one in every color!
customer_reviews.text: Thick quilted pad fits all our saddles- 17-18", standard and forward flap passoa saddles beautifully. I prefer wool inserts so the memory foam pads were not useful, however, they provided ample supply of the pre-cut foam pad inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is light and easy to throw up on your horse
customer_reviews.text: It is light and easy to throw up on your horse. It does not fit under my endurance saddle like I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: memphis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PAD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made pad, brilliant idea the pockets for the pads! I purchased additional gel pads for the front pockets. now it's SUPER perfect. My horse is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: frugal shopper

customer_reviews.title: An all around great comfort saddle pad
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I shouldn’t give these pads high marks until Iv owned them at least a year, but I’m pretty impressed with them so far. I like not having to use an additional half pad over my saddle pad-although this company makes a great half pad that I do also use when I want to use a regular saddle pad. The cons- the foam material has to be removed when they are laundered and it is a bit of a pain to put it back in. I also think that they are a tad expensive for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen goddess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The saddle pad fit my horse and my friends horse. (17in saddle) One of the best material for a english pad. My horse really enjoyed it and fit very well. I didn’t seem to see any issues besides the padding. I’d recommend getting your own gel padding and cutting them to fit. Other than that it’s a great saddle pad and i’d for sure recommend to anyone looking for a good quality pad. :)
customer_reviews.author: Hani

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these pads, and this colour rocks!  Shims are useless--but the pockets are great. :-)
customer_reviews.text: I use these pads with a couple different VSD and GP saddles. LOVE that I can shim treeless saddles easily. The shims that come with them are useless, but the pockets are lovely. Even just having the doubled layer under the panels are great for most treeless saddles. I am collecting these in many colours. :-p Good value, and excellent fit for StarTrekk Comfort
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Really convenient, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love having the correction pad integrated with the saddle pad, one less layer to deal with! Also really like the streamlined, cutaway XC shape of these pads for muddy rides and hot summer days. Washes up nicely (remember to take the shims out first) and dry on low or air dry for best results
customer_reviews.author: EBV

customer_reviews.title: Right idea with a couple design flaws
customer_reviews.text: This product is almost perfect. The padding is great and sits well on the horse. It is tough and durable and well worth the money. What I don’t like about it: the placement of the girth holding strap is awful. It needs to be slid forward quite a bit. I can place one of the girth straps through it but not both as it causes to pad to move out of place on the horse. Also for a high withered horse, it isn’t the best. It could use a either relief piece of material near the pommel area to better hold the pad in place because otherwise it slips back behind the withers.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders for my mare!
customer_reviews.text: My mare has been having a sore back due to poor saddle fit and aging. I needed a bounce pad, but most of the half pads I looked at were so expensive! This saddle pad is made of thick but flexible material and the pockets concealing the support pads stay closed but are easily accessible if you need to build the pad up more. I like it because I can add more padding or take out padding depending on which horse I'm riding. Seriously, if you're a broke college student and/or equestrian like me and you need something that looks nice and is functional, buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Unique product, great quality
customer_reviews.text: This unique pad is perfect to keep weight off of your horses sensitive areas. Additionally, it can be adjusted to make a saddle fit for multiple horses by adding or subtracting padding. Really unique product and something I will definitely be ordering more of!!
customer_reviews.author: malizoo

customer_reviews.title: Great pad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pad for the price! My thoroughbred had a sore back and is hollow. This pad makes him comfortable while we are in training to gat him to round out and rebuild his musculature over his back. Looks nice too. I love that I can remove shims as needed.
customer_reviews.author: ml

customer_reviews.title: Favorite saddle pad
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite saddle pad. I can use it on anyone by just changing up the padding. Will definitely buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great, our horse likes it
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great our QH and all purpose saddle. The memory foam seems to make it comfortable for him
customer_reviews.author: Cynosure

customer_reviews.title: Great pad but foam not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the pad is very good but the “memory foam” was very poor. I got new fo at the fabric store to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Nutter

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: What I have been looking for, for my eventing saddle for over five months!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and the style but the shims that came with horrible
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Well made, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great pad for my treeless saddle. Reasonable price, and fits the saddle well.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlocked

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described and the color is beautiful. Great pad.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Great for the price. Beautiful color. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t lay flat
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly as pictured. The color was great. My only problem was it doesn’t lay as flat as I want it to, or as a regular one would, that’s pretty much my only complaint so far other than that everything was exactly as it’s supposed to be. Hopefully the more use it gets it will contour better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pad!
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased for my daughter and her Peruvian gelding. They took their first ever camping trip together this month and the pad was perfect! Fit and comfort was more than excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pad. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. It matches the pictures online. Love the convenience of the removable shims. Love love my purchase. Great quality saddle pad.
customer_reviews.author: Kt k

customer_reviews.title: Not memory foam
customer_reviews.text: Nice pad, but not memory foam! Looks more like styrofoam...
customer_reviews.author: santo greco

customer_reviews.title: Do it! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my horse and under my saddle (17 crosby centennial). I’m buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Faith A. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice quality and several shims included! I bought a second so I would always have one dry and clean!
customer_reviews.author: beach fun

customer_reviews.title: One suggestion
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use as everyday pad because it wears pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Demond golden

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pad
customer_reviews.text: I love this saddle pad. It’s got three shims on both sides in multiple pockets. As my horse’s top line is developing I can take the shims out as needed. A good pad that rests off the spine and isn’t to bulky. I use it and like it with my monoflap forward seat Berney Brothers saddle. I have not washed it yet, but I got the navy and it’s quite pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Great Saddle Pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this saddle pad hoping to eliminate my other half pads because of bulk and saddle slip. I like that this pad has shims and I can adjust the fit as my horse "muscles up" and hopefully slims down a bit. It's a good thickness and seems to be good quality. It's held up nicely thru the hot summer. Looking forward to adding more to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: KMac

customer_reviews.title: I love this pad its super nice and looks great on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this pad its super nice and looks great on my horse! Its totally worth it for the price and the quality is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Barnstormer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great pad for the price. Plenty of cushion without being bulky. Fits my 17.5 pessoa close contact saddle well. Only drawback is the foam inserts are annoying to take out and put in for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia
